article_title: After years of red ink, S.J. General Hospital in the black
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: STOCKTON — San Joaquin General Hospital has had its financial problems, but budget projections show that the facility is set to end the current fiscal year securely in the black.That's despite the fact initial budgeting anticipated the county hospital would be operating about $4.5 million in the red during the fiscal year beginning July 1. But updated figures released in a snapshot of the first quarter of the budget year included a swing of nearly $30 million.Instead of losing money,
article_metadata.author: Zachary K. Johnson Record Staff Writer
